pages.text: Crows are nosy birds found in forest and plains.$(br2)These creatures are considered pests since they can ofter be found circling fields and damaging crop growth.$(br2)You can place a Carved Pumpkin to scare them away.
Crows can be tamed by throwing them some Pumpkin Seeds.

These tamed birds have multiple uses like made to sit, wander, follow or gather items.$(br2)You can heal your pet make it sit on a Hay Block.$(br2)When a crow gather items, it will place it in the nearest cointainer, like a chest or furnace with an item frame on it matching the held item.
